Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Sorry if this is a n00b question, but I'm at a loss. I was playing 0.19 for a while, and found (and tweaked) a VAB craft I liked a lot. Unfortunately, I had mechjeb on it, and it won't open properly now that I've upgraded to 0.22. I've got mechjeb installed on 0.22, but it indicates that a part is missing. I can't find a copy of 0.19 to download anywhere. Any suggestions on how to transfer this craft over?

Thanks!
You could try removing Mechjeb from the craft file, but that could have some really bad results...
